bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise cancer reporting requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 1-43-14 be amended to read as follows: 1-43-14. The reporting requirements of §§ 1-43-11 to 1-43-17, inclusive, may be met by any accredited tumor registry or pathology laboratory by submission to the Department of Health of the registry's or laboratory's internally-prepared annual report and the raw data used to produce the annual report. Any hospital licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12, physician licensed pursuant to chapter 36-4, physician assistant licensed pursuant to chapter 36-4A, nurse practitioner licensed pursuant to chapter 36-9A, pathology laboratory, or free-standing radiology center that detects, diagnoses, or treats a cancer case in South Dakota shall submit a report to the Department of Health as required by § § 1-43-11 to 1-43-17, inclusive. Section 2. That § 1-43-15 be repealed. 1-43-15. Any hospital not operating an accredited tumor registry is not required to submit a report to the Department of Health under the provisions of § 1-43-14. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Health and Human Services Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise cancer reporting requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 1-43-14 be amended to read as follows: 1-43-14. The reporting requirements of §§ 1-43-11 to 1-43-17, inclusive, may be met by any accredited tumor registry or pathology laboratory by submission to the Department of Health of the registry's or laboratory's internally-prepared annual report and the raw data used to produce the annual report. Any hospital licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12, physician licensed pursuant to chapter 36-4, physician assistant licensed pursuant to chapter 36-4A, nurse practitioner or nurse midwife licensed pursuant to chapter 36-9A, pathology laboratory, or free- standing radiology center that detects, diagnoses, or treats a cancer case in South Dakota shall submit a report to the Department of Health as required by § § 1-43-11 to 1-43-17, inclusive. Section 2. That § 1-43-15 be repealed. 1-43-15. Any hospital not operating an accredited tumor registry is not required to submit a report to the Department of Health under the provisions of § 1-43-14. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
